content: Hey, Looking to trade/sell a couple of the Kialara Silver Series, 2021 – ‘Exogenesis’. Ideally looking to trade for other Kialara's or sell outright. Both bars are of the 3.5mm stone variant and ship from the UK. Thanks!

comments.body: Great pieces and fair price, almost seems like a steal - but most items currently sold seem to be.Just wanted to inquire about the slab, where can I get these? Currently trying to put some of my collection into better order. Good slabs for Kialara bars would come in handy.
